article.title: Kongsberg Maritime Receives $11 Million Navy Contract
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: Kongsberg Maritime Incorporated is being awarded an $11 million fixed-price, indefinite delivery/indefinite quantity contract to procure and/or design, develop and manufacture hardware, logistics support, spares, commercial technical manuals and associated data related to the manufacture and sustainment of the AMPHIB Low Light Surveillance System Program.
